channel.title: CVE Feed for The Beaver Builder Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Beaver Builder Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-50889|2023-12-29T11:21:56.258Z -- the%20beaver%20builder%20team -- beaver%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in The Beaver Builder Team Beaver Builder – WordPress Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Beaver Builder – WordPress Page Builder: from n/a through 2.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-30425|2024-03-29T13:19:15.872Z -- the%20beaver%20builder%20team -- beaver%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in The Beaver Builder Team Beaver Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Beaver Builder: from n/a through 2.7.4.4.
